text: Dress Me Up! is an album by Denise Ho, released on December 19, 2003. ==Track listing== #懶 (Lazy) #忘 (Forget) #我是芭比 (I Am Barbie) #沙 (Sand) #娃鬼回魂 (Return of the Ghost Doll) #迪裡斯的婚禮 (Denise's Wedding Ceremony) #兩位一體 (Two Becomes One) #元神出竅 (Spirit Leaves) #無家可歸 (Homeless) #出生入死 (Through Heaven And Hell) #鬼 (Ghost) (Hidden Track) ==External links== * HOCC WEB! title: Dress Me Up! (album)
